squat.correct: Great job! Your squat form looks good.
squat.incorrect: Let's work on improving your squat form.

tempo.too_slow: You're slowing down. Try to maintain consistent speed.
tempo.good_speed: You're maintaining good speed throughout the exercise.

recommendations.suggest_stretch: Consider incorporating hip flexor stretches to improve your squat depth.
recommendations.increase_weight: You might consider increasing the weight to challenge yourself more.
recommendations.decrease_weight: If you're struggling, consider reducing the weight.
